Title: Custom WebPart with WebPart Page
Description: CustomWWP will make your work easier for creating webparts with webpart pages in sharepoint 2010. It will provide you automation in your work.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CustomWWP is provide you automation in work sharepoint work. This is just sample but it will allow you to think beyond the manual effort. Now no need to go ,create page and add webpart. This will done in only one click.Just activate feature.rest will go automatically. This is sharepoint 2010 sample

More info can be found here :http://sharepointwithravi.blogspot.com/2011/04/create-web-part-page-with-web-part-in.html
